sentence.Network_en: Look at the plebs! Getting all muddy! Haw haw haw!
sentence.Network_cn: 看看这些乡巴佬儿！满身污泥！嚯嚯嚯！

sentence.Network_en: Haw can he get by on such low wages?
sentence.Network_cn: 以如此低微的工资,他如何度日?

sentence.Network_en: Neither will Haw study nor go to school.

...行瘀的食疗价值，目录1食品简介2营养成分3生产制作方法一方法二方法三方法四方法五4主要功效5饮食文化6特产产地1食品简介山楂糕(haw jelly)是以山楂果汁、白糖和琼脂等为主要原料制成的一道美味甜品。山楂糕(15张)2营养成分每百克山楂果实中.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English haga, of Germanic origin; probably related to hedge (Compare Dutch haag 'hedge')
late middle English (denoting a discharge from the eye): of unknown origin

entry.def: Haws are the red berries produced by hawthorn trees in autumn.

entry.tran: 嚯嚯（文学作品中表示笑声，尤指嘲弄或轻蔑的笑声）
entry.def: Writers sometimes use 'haw haw' to show that one of their characters is laughing, especially in a rather unpleasant or superior way.

example.ex: Look at the plebs! Getting all muddy! Haw haw haw!
example.tran: 看看这些乡巴佬儿！满身污泥！嚯嚯嚯！

entry.tran: 支支吾吾;吞吞吐吐;嗫嚅
entry.def: If you hem and haw, or in British English hum and haw, you take a long time to say something because you cannot think of the right words, or because you are not sure what to say.

example.ex: Tim hemmed and hawed, but finally told his boss the truth.
example.tran: 蒂姆起初支支吾吾，但最终还是把真相告诉了老板。

means.word_mean: 1. a spring-flowering shrub or small tree of the genus Crataegus
2. the nictitating membrane of a horse
